requirements.summary: Ensure contact form is accessible and functional
acceptanceCriteria: Users can access the contact/order form from the main page
Form successfully submits inquiries to the backend
Success state is displayed after submission

file_operations.description: Review and verify the existing contact form implementation includes all required fields (name, email, phone, product interest dropdown with all five categories, message) and properly integrates with the useSubmitInquiry hook for backend submission
